source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 5,111 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 750 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 4,093 to 5,003 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 5,003 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for melee combat instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.

name: Kor'kron Tabard
description: Troops often claim the uniforms of their defeated foes.
